name: Naruto Shippuden 3D - The New Era [3DS]
description:
Naruto Shippuden 3D: The New Era is an arcade game developed by Takara Tomy. It came out on 31-03-2011. It was published by 505 Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Naruto Shippuden 3D: The New Era on Nintendo 3DS.
